note:
Dale Reardon is from Far North Queensland Australia and loves the tropical lifestyle and climate.
I am a lawyer (not practising currently) but ask that you not hold that against me.
I love everything to do with France. Wine, food, and champagne.
I am legally blind and use a wonderful large black guide dog, Cookie.
I have considerable experience with both online and offline businesses and have been marketing or conducting business online since 1996.
I am a great believer in the power of community
